thread.title: NIC Government Partners Honored for Online Services Making Government More Accessible
thread.title_full: NIC Government Partners Honored for Online Services Making Government More Accessible

title: NIC Government Partners Honored for Online Services Making Government More Accessible
text:
NIC Government Partners Honored for Online Services Making Government More Accessible [September 03, 2015] Tweet 
NIC Inc. (NASDAQ: EGOV ), the dominant provider of eGovernment services, congratulates five of its government partners for being awarded Digital Government Achievement Awards by the Center for Digital Government . 
The Digital Government Achievement Awards (DGAA) recognize outstanding agency and department websites and projects at the application and infrastructure level. 
"Our goal each and every day is to work with our government partners to develop the very best digital government services that provide convenience to the citizens and businesses they serve," said Robert Knapp, NIC ( News - Alert ) Chief Operating Officer. "It's great when these services also win awards and are honored for the efficiencie they are creating. Congratulations to all of our government partners and the NIC employees who work with them." 
eGovernment services developed in partnership with NIC were recognized in the following categories: 
Government-to-Government category: Utah Public Notice Website Social Media IntegrationArkansas State Auditor Automated Online Filing SystemMontana Safety Assessment Management System 
Driving Digital Government - state category: Arkansas Vehicle Registration Renewal iPad KiosksIndiana Management and Performance Hub 
Driving Digital Government - federal category: U.S. Department of Transportation, Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration, Pre-Employment Screening Program 
The Center for Digital Government is an international research and advisory institute on the use of information technology in government. The DGAA Awards will be presented September 25, 2015 in New Orleans. 
About NIC 
Founded in 1992, NIC (NASDAQ: EGOV) is the nation's leading provider of official government websites , online services, and secure payment processing solutions. The Company's innovative eGovernment services help make government more accessible to everyone through technology. The family of NIC companies provides eGovernment solutions for more than 3,500 federal, state, and local agencies in the United States. Forbes has named NIC as one of the "100 Best Small Companies in America" six times, most recently ranked at No. 36 (2014), and the Company has been included four times on the Barron's 400 Index. Additional information is available at https://www.egov.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150903005318/en/
